DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect single injection adductor canal block ( ACB ) pain score within 24 hour post total knee arthroplasty ( TKA ) .
DOC.brief_title: Does Single Injection Adductor Canal Block Improve Postoperative Analgesia Patients Receiving Periarticular Local Anesthesia Injections Total Knee Arthroplasty ?
DOC.criteria: Males Females age 18+ year old total knee arthroplasty ( TKA ) UCI Medical Center American Society Anesthesiologists physical status I III Allergy local anesthetic Pregnancy Nursing Mothers Children < 18 year age Renal impairment ( GFR < 60 mL/min/1.73m2 ) Hepatic Impairment ( active hepatitis , elevate AST ALT , jaundice ) Opioid tolerant patient ( define great 30 mg Morphine equivalent consume daily ) Patients diabetic peripheral neuropathy BMI great 40
